chart.title: Child mortality rate
chart.subtitle: The estimated share of newborns who die before reaching the age of five.
chart.citation: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2025)

Child mortality rate of children aged un.descriptionShort: The estimated number of deaths of children aged under five years, per 100 live births .
